subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: David Price allowed only one hit in his first start against his former team, a run-scoring triple by Brandon Guyer, but the Tampa Bay Rays beat the Detroit Tigers, 1-0, on Thursday to avoid a sweep.
snippet: David Price allowed only one hit in his first start against his former team, a run-scoring triple by Brandon Guyer, but the Tampa Bay Rays beat the Detroit Tigers, 1-0, on Thursday to avoid a sweep.
